description: Cisco Unified Communications Manager (aka CallManager) 9.1(2.10000.28), 10.5(2.10000.5), 10.5(2.12901.1), and 11.0(1.10000.10); Unified Communications Manager IM & Presence Service 10.5(2); Unified Contact Center Express 11.0(1); and Unity Connection 10.5(2) store a cleartext encryption key, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors, aka Bug ID CSCuv85958.
